Text:
This comic is a masterpice by one of the masters: Kazuo Umezo. 

Have you read "zashiki onna"? i think you'll like it.
If you admit requests, the full "Hino Horrors" would be great, but i think they haven't been scanned yet.
You are uploading some of the best and creepiest and "mindfuckiest" horror mangas. Thank you very much for these.

Thanks for the recommendation, I'll be sure to check it out.

I managed to find the 14th book in the Hino Horror series "Skin and Bone", along with another book by him "Hell Baby".

I'll post the links here once I finish downloading them.

Zashiki Onna - http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8279465/

Hell Baby - 
http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8279447

Skin and Bone - http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8279457/
You're welcome. hope you like it. Good nightmare material here :)
